data.text:
@SarahWoods66 Yes, I remember, and especially with living alone, your photos - were a real comfort to me. I'd hugged my grandson in March and boarded my train - knowing I may not see him for a few months and I didn't.

My heart goes out to the families in Ukraine.♥️
@SarahWoods66 During these last 2 years , I enjoyed your beautiful pictures so much!Looking forward to our holiday in Traws next Sunday ,can't wait ..

@SarahWoods66 Love your pictures especially now to brighten the day during these troubling times. Who ever imagined we would have worse, not better,  to deal with after 2 years of COVID and all that brought to each of us. I can’t imagine how awful this must be for the Ukrainians to bear.
@SarahWoods66 I think there's a shared disbelief that covid itself wasn't the battle to end all battles. Thanks for the regular images, lovely to see.
